welcome.body: Let's get you set up. This takes about a minute. You can skip at any time â€” everything can be configured later in Settings.
welcome.skip: Skip, I'll set things up later

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.subtitle: Enable the features you want to use. You can change any of these later in Settings.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Get reminders for your workouts, timers, and scheduled activities. Without this, reminders and alarms won't work when the app is in the background.

location.title: Location tracking
location.description: Track your route and distance during outdoor activities like running and cycling. Select "Allow all the time" so GPS tracking continues even when the screen is off.

stepCounter.title: Step counter
stepCounter.description: Count your daily steps using your phone's built-in sensor. This also powers the Steps home screen widget.

exactAlarms.title: Exact alarms
exactAlarms.description: Allows timers and alarms to fire at the exact time you set, even when the app is closed.

batteryOptimization.title: Battery optimization
batteryOptimization.description: Disable battery optimization so GPS tracking and background features work reliably without being killed by the system.

aboutYou.title: What's your weight?
aboutYou.description: Your weight is used to estimate calories burned during activities. You can update it anytime in the Weight section.

complete.title: You're all set!
complete.body: You can always adjust your settings, permissions, and profile from the menu. Enjoy tracking!

skipModal.title: Skip setup?
skipModal.body: Are you sure? You can set up everything later from Settings and Profile.
